x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Nuvolo's back-end application runs on the ServiceNow platform. Each new release of Nuvolo will be certified on the latest supported ServiceNow releases available at the time of release. ServiceNow supports the latest version of its platform as well as two versions of lower.
In this Probe, we are going to check if the installed ServiceNow version is compatible with the Nuvolo version.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Platform Compatibility with ServiceNow
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Need to upgrade to a compatible version.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_72dffaa01b49d910ae5b21b5ec4bcb39
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Nuvolo's back-end application runs on the ServiceNow platform. Each new release of Nuvolo will be certified on the latest supported ServiceNow releases available at the time of release. ServiceNow supports the latest version of its platform as well as two versions of lower.

In this Probe, we are going to check if the installed ServiceNow version is compatible with the Nuvolo version.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Platform Compatibility with ServiceNow</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Need to upgrade to a compatible version.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var versionsMap = {
    "8": {
        version: "Germany",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Madrid", "New York", "Orlando"],
    },
    "9": {
        version: "Hungary",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Madrid", "New York"],
    },
    "10": {
        version: "India",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Madrid", "New York", "Orlando", ],
    },
    "11": {
        version: "Japan",
        compatibilityVersion: ["New York", "Orlando"]
    },
    "12": {
        version: "Kenya",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Orlando", "Paris"],
    },
    "13": {
        version: "Latvia",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Orlando", "Paris"],
    },
    "14": {
        version: "Mexico",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Orlando", "Paris", "Quebec"],
    },
    "15": {
        version: "Norway",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Paris", "Quebec", "Rome"],
    },
    "16": {
        version: "Oman",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Paris", "Quebec", "Rome"],
    },
    "17": {
        version: "Pakistan",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Paris", "Quebec", "Rome", "Sandiego", "Tokyo"],
    },
    "18": {
        version: "Qatar",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Quebec", "Rome", "Sandiego", "Tokyo"],
    },
    "19": {
        version: "Romania",
        compatibilityVersion: ["Rome", "Sandiego", "Tokyo"],
    },
};

var version;
var nuvoloVersionQuery = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true";
var nuvoloVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
nuvoloVersion.addEncodedQuery(nuvoloVersionQuery);
nuvoloVersion.query();
if (nuvoloVersion.next()) {
    version = nuvoloVersion.version.split('.')[0];
    //gs.addInfoMessage("Nuvolo version is " + version);
}

var sversion;
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_upgrade_history');
gr.addEncodedQuery('from_version!=n/a');
gr.setLimit('1');
gr.orderByDesc('upgrade_finished');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    //gs.addInfoMessage(gr.to_version);
    sversion = gr.task_board.getDisplayValue().split(' Patch')[0];
    //gs.addInfoMessage("ServiceNow version is " + sversion);
}

var obj = versionsMap[version.toString()];
var result = obj.compatibilityVersion.indexOf(sversion);
if (result == -1) {
    util.handleOutput("The Nuvolo " + obj.version + " version is not certified  with the ServiceNow " + sversion + " version",'Critical','ServiceNow');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Samadhan.Gaikwad@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-29 12:13:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>72dffaa01b49d910ae5b21b5ec4bcb39</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Platform Compatibility with ServiceNow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_72dffaa01b49d910ae5b21b5ec4bcb39</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
